Biasing/src/EcalProcessFilter.cxx
00001 /*
00002  * @file EcalProcessFilter.cxx
00003  * @brief User action plugin that biases Geant4 to only process events which
00004  *        involve a photonuclear reaction in the ECal.
00005  * @author Omar Moreno
00006  *         SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory
00007  */
00008 
00009 #include "Biasing/EcalProcessFilter.h"
00010 
00011 namespace ldmx { 
00012 
00013     extern "C" EcalProcessFilter* createEcalProcessFilter() {
00014         return new EcalProcessFilter;
00015     }
00016 
00017     extern "C" void destroyEcalProcessFilter(EcalProcessFilter* object) {
00018         delete object;
00019     }

00021     EcalProcessFilter::EcalProcessFilter() {
00022         messenger_ = new EcalProcessFilterMessenger(this);
00023     }

00025     EcalProcessFilter::~EcalProcessFilter() {
00026     }

00028     G4ClassificationOfNewTrack EcalProcessFilter::stackingClassifyNewTrack(
00029             const G4Track* track, 
00030             const G4ClassificationOfNewTrack& currentTrackClass) {
00031 
00032         /*std::cout << "********************************" << std::endl;*/ 
00033         /*std::cout << "*   Track pushed to the stack  *" << std::endl;*/
00034         /*std::cout << "********************************" << std::endl;*/
00035 
00036         // get the PDGID of the track.
00037         //G4int pdgID = track->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding();
00038 
00039         // Get the particle type.
00040         G4String particleName = track->GetParticleDefinition()->GetParticleName();
00041 
00042         /*std::cout << "[ TargetBremFilter ]: " << "\n" 
00043                     << "\tParticle " << particleName << " ( PDG ID: " << pdgID << " ) : " << "\n"
00044                     << "\tTrack ID: " << track->GetTrackID() << "\n" 
00045                     << std::endl;*/
00046 
00047         if (track == currentTrack_) {
00048             currentTrack_ = nullptr; 
00049             return fWaiting; 
00050         }
00051 
00052         // Use current classification by default so values from other plugins are not overridden.
00053         G4ClassificationOfNewTrack classification = currentTrackClass;
00054         
00055         return classification;
00056     }
00057 
00058     void EcalProcessFilter::stepping(const G4Step* step) { 
00059 
00060         if (TargetBremFilter::getBremGammaList().empty()) { 
00061             return;
00062         } 
00063         
00064         // Get the track associated with this step.
00065         G4Track* track = step->GetTrack();
00066 
00067         // Only process tracks whose parent is the primary particle
00068         if (track->GetParentID() != 1) return; 
00069 
00070         // get the PDGID of the track.
00071         G4int pdgID = track->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding();
00072 
00073         // Make sure that the particle being processed is an electron.
00074         // TODO: At some point all particle types should be allowed.
00075         if (pdgID != 22) return; 
00076 
00077         // Get the volume the particle is in.
00078         G4VPhysicalVolume* volume = track->GetVolume();
00079         G4String volumeName = volume->GetName();
00080 
00081         /*std::cout << "*******************************" << std::endl;*/ 
00082         /*std::cout << "*   Step " << track->GetCurrentStepNumber() << std::endl;*/
00083         /*std::cout << "********************************" << std::endl;*/
00084         
00085         // Get the particle type.
00086         G4String particleName = track->GetParticleDefinition()->GetParticleName();
00087         
00088         // Get the kinetic energy of the particle.
00089         //double incidentParticleEnergy = step->GetPreStepPoint()->GetTotalEnergy();
00090 
00091         /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]:\n" 
00092                     << "\tTotal energy of " << particleName  << ": " << incidentParticleEnergy << " MeV \n"
00093                     << "\tPDG ID: " << pdgID << "\n"
00094                     << "\tTrack ID: " << track->GetTrackID() << "\n" 
00095                     << "\tStep #: " << track->GetCurrentStepNumber() << "\n"
00096                     << "\tParent ID: " << track->GetParentID() << "\n"
00097                     << "\tParticle currently in " << volumeName  << std::endl;*/
00098 
00099         // If the particle isn't in the specified volume, stop processing the 
00100         // event.
00101         std::vector<G4Track*> bremGammaList = TargetBremFilter::getBremGammaList();
00102         if (std::find(std::begin(volumes_), std::end(volumes_), volumeName) == std::end(volumes_)) {
00103 
00104                     /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: "
00105                                 << "Brem is in " << volumeName  << std::endl;*/
00106 
00107             // If secondaries were produced outside of the volume of interest, 
00108             // and there aren't additional brems to process, abort the 
00109             // event.  Otherwise, suspend the track and move on to the next 
00110             // brem.
00111             if (step->GetSecondary()->size() != 0 
00112                     && (std::find(bremGammaList.begin(), bremGammaList.end(), track) != bremGammaList.end())) { 
00113                 
00114                 /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: "
00115                             << "Reaction occured outside volume of intereset --> Aborting event." 
00116                             << std::endl;*/
00117 
00118                 if (bremGammaList.size() == 1) { 
00119                     track->SetTrackStatus(fKillTrackAndSecondaries);
00120                     G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->AbortEvent();
00121                     currentTrack_ = nullptr;
00122                     return;
00123                 } else {
00124 
00125                     currentTrack_ = track; 
00126                     track->SetTrackStatus(fSuspend);
00127                     TargetBremFilter::removeBremFromList(track);
00128                     return;
00129                 }
00130             }
00131             return;
00132         }
00133 
00134         // The list of brems will only contain a given track/particle if it 
00135         // originates from the target.  If the gamma originates elsewhere, 
00136         // suspend it and move on to the next gamma.
00137         // TODO: At some point, this needs to be modified to include brems 
00138         // from downstream of the target.
00139         if (std::find(bremGammaList.begin(), bremGammaList.end(), track) == bremGammaList.end()) { 
00140             
00141             /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: "
00142                         << "Brem list doesn't contain track." << std::endl;*/
00143             
00144             currentTrack_ = track; 
00145             track->SetTrackStatus(fSuspend);
00146             return;
00147         }
00148  
00149         // Get the particles daughters.
00150         const G4TrackVector* secondaries = step->GetSecondary();
00151 
00152 
00153         // If the particle doesn't interact, then move on to the next step.
00154         if (secondaries->size() == 0) { 
00155             
00156             /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: "
00157                         << "Brem photon did not interact --> Continue propogating track."
00158                         << std::endl;*/    
00159         
00160             // If the particle is exiting the bounding volume, kill it.
00161             if (!boundVolumes_.empty() && step->GetPostStepPoint()->GetStepStatus() == fGeomBoundary) {
00162                 if (std::find(std::begin(boundVolumes_), std::end(boundVolumes_), volumeName) != std::end(boundVolumes_)) {
00163 
00164                     /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: "
00165                                 << "Brem photon is exiting the volume --> particle will be killed or suspended."
00166                                 << std::endl;*/    
00167                     
00168                     if (bremGammaList.size() == 1) { 
00169                         track->SetTrackStatus(fKillTrackAndSecondaries);
00170                         G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->AbortEvent();
00171                         currentTrack_ = nullptr;
00172                         /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: " 
00173                                     << " Brem list is empty --> Killing all tracks!"
00174                                     << std::endl;*/
00175                         return;
00176                     } else { 
00177                         currentTrack_ = track; 
00178                         track->SetTrackStatus(fSuspend);
00179                         TargetBremFilter::removeBremFromList(track);
00180                         /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: " 
00181                                     << " Other tracks still need to be processed --> Suspending track!"
00182                                     << std::endl;*/
00183                         return;
00184                     }
00185                 }
00186             }
00187 
00188         } else {
00189 
00190             // If the brem gamma interacts and produces secondaries, get the 
00191             // process used to create them. 
00192             G4String processName = secondaries->at(0)->GetCreatorProcess()->GetProcessName(); 
00193             
00194             /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: "
00195                         << "Brem photon produced " << secondaries->size() 
00196                         << " particle via " << processName << " process." 
00197                         << std::endl;*/
00198 
00199             // Only record the process that is being biased
00200             if (!processName.contains(BiasingMessenger::getProcess())) {
00201 
00202                 /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: "
00203                             << "Process was not " << BiasingMessenger::getProcess() 
00204                             << std::endl;*/
00205                 
00206                 if (bremGammaList.size() == 1) { 
00207                     track->SetTrackStatus(fKillTrackAndSecondaries);
00208                     G4RunManager::GetRunManager()->AbortEvent();
00209                     currentTrack_ = nullptr;
00210                     /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: " 
00211                               << " Brem list is empty --> Killing all tracks!"
00212                               << std::endl;*/
00213                     return;
00214                 } else { 
00215                     currentTrack_ = track; 
00216                     track->SetTrackStatus(fSuspend);
00217                     TargetBremFilter::removeBremFromList(track);
00218                     /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: " 
00219                                 << " Other tracks still need to be processed --> Suspending track!"
00220                                 << std::endl;*/
00221                     return;
00222                 }
00223             }
00224             
00225             std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: "
00226                       << "Brem photon produced " << secondaries->size() 
00227                       << " particle via " << processName << " process." 
00228                       << std::endl;
00229             TargetBremFilter::removeBremFromList(track);
00230             BiasingMessenger::setEventWeight(track->GetWeight());
00231             photonGammaID_ = track->GetTrackID(); 
00232         }
00233 
00234     }
00235 
00236     void EcalProcessFilter::postTracking(const G4Track* track) { 
00237        
00238         if (track->GetParentID() == photonGammaID_) { 
00239             UserTrackInformation* userInfo 
00240               = dynamic_cast<UserTrackInformation*>(track->GetUserInformation());
00241             userInfo->setSaveFlag(true); 
00242             // get the PDGID of the track.
00243             //G4int pdgID = track->GetParticleDefinition()->GetPDGEncoding();
00244             G4ThreeVector pvec = track->GetMomentum();
00245             /*std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]:\n" 
00246                         << "\tPDG ID: " << pdgID << "\n"
00247                         << "\tTrack ID: " << track->GetTrackID() << "\n" 
00248                         << "\tStep #: " << track->GetCurrentStepNumber() << "\n"
00249                         << "\tParent ID: " << track->GetParentID() << "\n"
00250                         << "\t p: [ " << pvec[0] << ", " << pvec[1] << ", " << pvec[2] << " ]" << std::endl;*/
00251         }
00252     }
00253 
00254     void EcalProcessFilter::addVolume(std::string volume) { 
00255         
00256         std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: Applying filter to volume " << volume << std::endl;
00257         if (volume.compare("ecal") == 0) { 
00258             for (G4VPhysicalVolume* physVolume : *G4PhysicalVolumeStore::GetInstance()) {
00259                 G4String physVolumeName = physVolume->GetName();
00260                 if ((physVolumeName.contains("W") || physVolumeName.contains("Si")) 
00261                         && physVolumeName.contains("phys")) {
00262                     volumes_.push_back(physVolumeName);
00263                 }
00264             }
00265         } else { 
00266             volumes_.push_back(volume);
00267         } 
00268     }        
00269     
00270     void EcalProcessFilter::addBoundingVolume(std::string volume) { 
00271         std::cout << "[ EcalProcessFilter ]: Bounding particle to volume " << volume << std::endl;
00272         boundVolumes_.push_back(volume);
00273     }        
00274 }
